profile: Enthusiastic third-year Computer Science and Engineering student at SRM IST, specialization in Information Technology. Skilled in full-stack and Android app development, with expertise in creating user-friendly interfaces and database management. Strong problem-solving abilities, adaptability, and time management skills drive my passion to contribute to innovative projects in a dynamic development environment.

experience.description: Currently developing a real-time industry-related website using full stack technologies (MERN Stack). Gaining hands-on experience with live projects, collaborating with team members to ensure project requirements are met and delivered on time.
Gained comprehensive training and learned fundamental cloud computing concepts and advanced architectural principles specific to the AWS ecosystem.
Developed knowledge with the Lightning, Visualforce, and Apex components, while understanding the impact of process builder automation, workflows, and Salesforce object setup operations.
Obtained hands-on experience in Android development, proficient in crafting responsive interfaces using XML and Kotlin within Android Studio.

projects.name: EatsEase - Online Food Ordering System
projects.description: The platform offers a online food ordering experience, enabling users to register, browse menus, add items to their cart, and checkout seamlessly.

projects.name: Banking-KYC
projects.description: Implemented a secure banking KYC verification platform where users access KYC information, provide details via an intuitive interface, and use Facial Authentication for enhanced security.

projects.name: Control Engineering Lab
projects.description: Collaborating with SRM faculty to develop an intuitive e-Lab platform with engaging front-end and efficient cloud-based backend.

projects.name: ProductPage
projects.description: Crafted a basic smartwatch product, offering dynamic color displays, and precise timekeeping functionality.

projects.name: To-Do List
projects.description: Created a straightforward to-do list which allows users to add, delete, and mark tasks as completed.

projects.name: School Dropout Analysis
projects.description: Analyze school dropout trends and established a ML system for prediction, and created an interactive UI for enhanced accessibility to dropout predictions.

projects.name: BMI
projects.description: Developed a user-friendly application using Java to calculate BMI categorizes into different weight status.

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: Designed and developed a dynamic weather application allowing users to retrieve real-time weather information by inputting city names.

certificates: Udemy - ReactJS - Complete Guide for Frontend Web Development
NPTEL - The Joy of Computing using Python
AWS Academy Cloud Architecting and Cloud Foundations

scholarships.name: Performance Based Scholarship
scholarships.description: Achieved a performance-based scholarship of Rs.55,000 during my initial academic year.
